sql-map.name: AdvancesProductIPMap
sql-map.mapped-statement: INSERT INTO ADVANCES_PROD_INTPAY (PROD_ID, CR_INT_PAID, APPL_CRINT_RATE, CR_INT_CALCFREQ, CR_INT_APPLFREQ, LAST_INTCALC_DTCR, LAST_INTAPPL_DTCR, CR_COMP, CR_INT_COMPFREQ, CR_PROD_ROUNDOFF, CR_INT_ROUNDOFF, CALC_CRITERIA, PROD_FREQ, ADDI_INT_STAFF, ADDI_INT_STAFF_PER ) VALUES ( #prodId:VARCHAR#, #crIntPaid:VARCHAR#, #applCrintRate:NUMERIC#, #crIntCalcfreq:NUMERIC#, #crIntApplfreq:NUMERIC#, #lastIntcalcDtcr:DATE#, #lastIntapplDtcr:DATE#, #crComp:VARCHAR#, #crIntCompfreq:NUMERIC#, #crProdRoundoff:VARCHAR#, #crIntRoundoff:VARCHAR#, #calcCriteria:VARCHAR#, #prodFreq:NUMERIC#, #addiIntStaff:VARCHAR#, #addiIntStaffPer:NUMERIC#)

UPDATE ADVANCES_PROD_INTPAY SET PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#, CR_INT_PAID = #crIntPaid:VARCHAR#, APPL_CRINT_RATE = #applCrintRate:NUMERIC#, CR_INT_CALCFREQ = #crIntCalcfreq:NUMERIC#, CR_INT_APPLFREQ = #crIntApplfreq:NUMERIC#, LAST_INTCALC_DTCR = #lastIntcalcDtcr:DATE#, LAST_INTAPPL_DTCR = #lastIntapplDtcr:DATE#, CR_COMP = #crComp:VARCHAR#, CR_INT_COMPFREQ = #crIntCompfreq:NUMERIC#, CR_PROD_ROUNDOFF = #crProdRoundoff:VARCHAR#, CR_INT_ROUNDOFF = #crIntRoundoff:VARCHAR#, CALC_CRITERIA = #calcCriteria:VARCHAR#, PROD_FREQ = #prodFreq:NUMERIC#, ADDI_INT_STAFF = #addiIntStaff:VARCHAR#, ADDI_INT_STAFF_PER = #addiIntStaffPer:NUMERIC# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
